items.title: Simple Ingredients, Delicious Taste
items.description: Homemade batter flipped to perfection. With plenty of delicious toppings and syrups to choose from!

items.title: Support The Dream!
items.description: Sandra's Mini Pancakes is a passion project started early in 2022. We love to cater events all across Orange County, Inland Empire, and LA County. The dream is simple deliver delicious pancakes!

items.name: Tailwind
items.description: Tailwind CSS is a highly customizable, low-level CSS framework for quickly creating beautiful designs without any annoying opinionated stylesheet nonsense.
